## VirtualListProxy.scrollToItem() method

Scrolls the list so that the specified item is visible

**Signature:**

```typescript
scrollToItem(index: number): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  index | number | Index of item to scroll to |

**Returns:**

void
